name: FrogNJump
description:
For Mini Jam 106: Frog²

HOW TO PLAY:

Go towards the end, if the Bar on the left is empty You Jump and don't go towards the red Spikes or you lose a heart. If you lost three hearts you Game Over. Oh and there's the green gems to Jump again.

CONTROLS:

AD / Left Right ArrowKeys - Move.

Space - Start/Reset.
